duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely move all parts in and around client Data Centers using various technology and equipment.
Maintain strict inventory control and conduct accurate system transactions.
Ensure accurate and timely shipments and receipts.
Transport inventory by hand, material handling equipment, and box truck in accordance with safety procedures.
Commit to excellence in overall Service Delivery.
Align with Milestone Core Values of Sense of Urgency, Collaboration, Open Honest Respectful Communication, Do What We Say, and going Above and Beyond.
